pkgmetadata.longdescription: Survival Analysis with Sparse Longitudinal Covariates // Survival analysis with sparse longitudinal covariates under right censoring scheme. Different hazards models are involved. Please cite the manuscripts corresponding to this package: Sun, Z. et al. (2022) doi:10.1007/s10985-022-09548-6, Sun, Z. and Cao, H. (2023) arXiv:2310.15877 and Sun, D. et al. (2023) arXiv:2308.15549.
